DOC.brief_title: Axis™ Allograft Dermis Female Pelvic Floor Repair : Prospective Post Market Study
DOC.criteria: Adult female least 18 year age . Willing able provide write informed consent . Confirmed pelvic organ prolapse ( POP ) Stage 2 high determine POPQ prolapse grade require surgical intervention anterior , posterior combine ( anterior posterior ) compartment . Willing able complete followup visit procedure indicate protocol . Concurrent surgical treatment pelvic organ prolapse use anything Axis Dermis .
